turns.text: Alright Allen Uh the questions is concerning the changes in the roles of American women in the past several generations and you know in their the society we live in What do you think has occurred there
turns.label: o

turns.text: Well I think one of the major changes is the whole attitude towards women in the work place and the role of women in doing jobs outside of the home Thats probably one of the major changes I see over the last period of time
turns.label: sv

turns.text: uh-huh But are are they being given the full honor for the work they are doing and for the uh oh my gosh I cant think of the word but for the what they have to accept thats they are responsible for Uh responsibilities is what I am trying to say
turns.label: b

turns.text: Oh I dont think so I think it has come long ways in terms of giving them equal opportunities --
turns.label: ng

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- but I still think in lots of job markets they are not treated as equals In other words in some respects the other direction in some job markets they dont really want to be treated as equals
turns.label: sv

turns.text: By the same token most in most cases women have the jobs with the same responsibility of men who have been there before but at lower salaries
turns.label: aap

turns.text: Yes I think thats --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Is that right and wrong
turns.label: qy

turns.text: -- generally speaking pretty true And I think thats what we really ought to look at that going is if they are going to do equal work they ought to get equal pay
Yes
turns.label: aa

turns.text: And that uh they ought to have equal opportunities to advance to those positions --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and I dont think that we have gotten there yet
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah Well what changes do you think are most significant over the past few years Any individual thing --
turns.label: b

turns.text: Oh boy
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- or is it just general switch over
turns.label: qrr

turns.text: I think its generally that switch over And and I think that switch over has been more in the work force I dont think that women are treated as equals in the home as much as they are in the work force I think those women who are out working are probably still expected to carry more responsibility at home --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- that the husband is having them on the other side of that coin picked up as much responsibility at home So they have one and three quarters jobs now Whereas the husbands have one and quarter
I have feeling that business with the woman working out at the same level of responsibility as their husband sort of tears into their social or their loving relationship
turns.label: sv@

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: In that uh the the lady needs to stand up for what she has made and her own rights and has right to do so and this upsets the man because we have always been built to think that we were sort of head of the household So do you think that is going to be uh difficult saying as far as marriages and people enjoying each other --
Yes
turns.label: ny

turns.text: -- in the future years

Yeah I think also in terms of parenting I think there is going to be some increasing problem because I think women are expecting husbands to do more parenting and I am not sure they are becoming more skilled at it
turns.label: ny

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: So I think it really has put some additional stresses on the family units
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well do you have any opinion of potential changes that may occur in the next generation specifically
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Well I I think one of the things that always happens is I think is when the one end wh- you know were moving out to the end where lot of women will be at work --
turns.label: na

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and then I think we are starting to see now some tendency of women at mid thirties and so the opinion of this career thing isnt all that it is cracked up to be and I want to go back and do something else I think we will probably see the sw- pendulum in terms of the work force swing back little bit
turns.label: sv

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Also much of it is driven by economics right now
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yes
turns.label: aa

turns.text: People have gotten out and gotten use to incomes coming in
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well I actually mo- - lot of women are being hired now instead of men because they can get brought in at lower salaries because thats what everybody else assumes they are going to get
Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: And the people - Well how do you feel about women in uh armed services
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well I think they ought to have the right I have some problems with my own family thinking about my wife going to com- or my wife and my daughter going into combat --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- but I have problems with men doing that and I guess if they want to they ought to have the right to do it
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Um
turns.label: b

turns.text: Its nothing I would be greatly enthusiastic about pushing for it
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah I somehow cant do that I was brought up in the ages where the ladies were kept home safe secure and made happy and the men went out and took responsibility of earning the money bringing in whatever they needed and protected the household and it it really still bothers me I spent plenty of years in the service but it still bothers me to see ladies out in combat or actually out in places where there is two or three of them there and five hundred men around I mean how are they going to protect themselves so to speak
turns.label: b

turns.text: I agree
turns.label: aa

turns.text: It puts them in very bad situation I I really dont go for that
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I think one of the other things that concern has concerned me little bit - and I think I see some change in attitudes there My wife happens to be wife who has chosen to stay at home --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and theres uh has been tendency over the past few years to treat her as though she was somebody who didnt have much intelligence --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yep
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- because if she did she would be out in the work force uh fulfilling herself

Well thats not fair Because I can tell you one thing stay home sometime and start doing some of those jobs that shes been handling and youre going to learn there is lot of responsibility just keeping the home going
turns.label: o@

turns.text: And I hope we reach the point where whatever women chose to do thats acceptable
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: If they chose to go into the work force thats okay
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: If they chose not to thats acceptable
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And if they go into the work force they should be treated as nicely --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: As equals
-- as as well as man or any other person And uh not -
